name: Freedom Park
description: Freedom Park is a large park that extends through Old Fourth Ward, Inman Park, the Highlands and Little Five Points. It connects to the MLK center and the Beltline. The Carter center sits at its heart. The park has playgrounds on the easternmost regions and paved paths extending throughout the park.
parking: Parking varies depending on which area of the park you visit. Street parking is pretty easy to find in most adjacent neighborhoods.
